website_summaries.verdict: For the breakfast lover who likes toast, but also craves pizza; features a unique pizza drawer.
pros: Features a pizza drawer that cooks pies quickly
Control knobs are easy to use
A 60-minute timer with an auto shut-off

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Handle came completely broken off. Screws are not long enough to support the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: We used this product a total of 2 times to make toast thought it was great on the 3rd time half way through the toasting cycle the glass shattered and blew outward.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great oven
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I use my oven for most of my cooking because it is usually to hot to use the stove oven. So far this has worked great but I am still getting used to the settings for the toaster. The inside is large enough to bake a cake or a nice tenderloin and it is so easy to clean, a good wipe down usually does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Bookie

customer_reviews.title: Erratic Toasting
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this oven for about 3 1/2 months. I like the look, although it is a little large for the countertop. The little pizza drawer on the bottom does a nice job too, for quesadillas, etc. The problem is that the toasting is so erratic I end up throwing away 1/2 of what I toast. It is either burnt or under toasted. I've tried for months to see if I could somehow figure out how to standardize the toasting setting, but even setting it the same way turns out different doneness of toast. This is frustrating to me and I think I'm going to buy an old fashioned toaster.
customer_reviews.author: sk101012

customer_reviews.title: The pizza oven is a real treat, not only ...
customer_reviews.text: The pizza oven is a real treat, not only for pizza but also for appetisers and other bites. A bit big but worth the space. The timer for the toaster is not exact so you really need to stay nearby when toasting or you might have a burnt offering.
customer_reviews.author: Christene Campbell Gabor

customer_reviews.title: Best of all worlds in the toaster oven realm.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a friend and he loves it. Says the Pizza came out great and he gives it a thumbs up. I bought this, as I have an Oster oven that was given to me, and it is very superior to the other one I started with. Another plus, is that it is "old school"...(no digital panel on it). Just old fashioned dials that are understandable. I highly reccommend this one with the Pizza unit on it. Especially for those Bachelor guys.
customer_reviews.author: Steeny G

customer_reviews.title: This oven was a disappointment. The pizza crust burns and cooks unevenly
customer_reviews.text: This oven was a disappointment. The pizza crust burns and cooks unevenly. Very inconsistent when making toast. Sometimes it burns it in less than two minutes and other times it take forever.
customer_reviews.author: dclark

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband gave it to me as a gift for Mother's Day. I LOVE IT!! We have pizza at least a dozen times. Baked lasagna, made my son's birthday cake and we warm/toast bread in it.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: second times the charm
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 5 stars but I had to send the first one back. While the pizza drawer worked. The main compartment would only get up to about 150 degrees F. the replacement gets hotter. If my thermometer is correct the oven gets about 25 degrees hotter than the thermostat setting. I can live with that. I baked a iron skillet cookie in it today to test the heat and timer.
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pizza Oven and Toaster! LOVE
customer_reviews.text: We feel like we bought a fancy pizza oven AND it also toasts and bakes! There aren’t many toasters this side and it’s just perfection. We are happy. I’m crazy about reading reviews and this had enough great ones for me to buy. It’s pretty too! Our friends were impressed with the pizza carrier that slides out!!!
customer_reviews.author: Norma T

customer_reviews.title: Needed a STAT replacement as my convection oven died. ...
customer_reviews.text: Needed a STAT replacement as my convection oven died. We rarely use our oven anymore as just cooking for 2. OK so have to admit the pizza tray is what caught my eye and it works well. Problem only is old fashioned turn dials and if you put the oven timer too high you can't bring it down; old tic toc timer type; not that exact, but for the price it was worth it
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Handle fell off no way to reattach
customer_reviews.text: Heating. Pigs in a blanket horsd’oruvres for thanksgiving thehsndle falls off in my hand there is no way to reattach. This item was purchased in sept if 17 but not even opened and used until April of 2018 very disappointed I bought Oster brand because of the name & reputation
customer_reviews.author: Pam Bestenheider

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Convection Oven and Genius Pizza Drawer!
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic convection oven! The pizza maker drawer is a fantastic addition! The way you can open up the handles to slide it out of the oven and slide the pizza onto a plate is genius! I bought this for our beach house rental and am buying another for home, I love it so much. Works great, doesn't take up too much counter space. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: J. Rich

customer_reviews.title: Not for commercial use
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed to find out that this wouldn't cook a pizza in the drawer at the same time as baking something in the oven due to surge protection or wattage overload. I wish I would've known this before I bought it because I'm using it to bake multiple things for a snack bar and time is of the essence. It also is quite small. It barely fits a 12" pizza. Albeit it cooks it well. So, I wouldn't use this for commercial use. Probably great for a bachelor or college student who moves a lot and doesn't have access to a full-on kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Purchase Agent

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this oven for 1 year now. The look is modern, although it's on a larger side for the countertop. Out of entire oven we like the pizza drawer only. The problem is that the toasting is so uneven. It is either burnt or under toasted. We tried for several months to find the combination temperature & timing for good toast with no luck. This is frustrating and at this moment just waiting until this oven break and will get something different .
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: The Cadillac of convection ovens
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased this product for my place of employment. We are not all fans of the microwave and who does not like to buy a frozen pizza from time to time. Anyhow, we have been using this oven for 3 weeks and we are all loving it. This thing takes no time to heat up. It does not take much to learn how to use the product. Just do read the instructions for the pizza drawer. I wish I had one of these at home, but my girlfriend would not let me pay this much for one, so in the meantime I will enjoy having one at work.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Henao

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little oven!
customer_reviews.text: This little oven is Awesome! I purchased this oven because of my past experience with the Oster brand. This little oven lives up to my expectations 100%. The pizza try is what really drew my interest. I had to try this on the first day we received the oven. I made the pizza “better” than our regular gas fired convection oven! The crust was crispy more so than the regular oven. The time was spot on and this from a small toaster oven with a frozen pizza straight from the freezer! I highly recommend this little guy for your kitchen or camper; you won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Toungetwster

customer_reviews.title: Oster product of the well equipped kitchen
customer_reviews.text: An absolutely great counter top unit. So easy to make 12 inch pizzas, I broke my no gluten intentions. I use it to replace my wife as main chef. Especially great for the green bean bean mushroom fried onion meal.
customer_reviews.author: Jack L. Ludwig

customer_reviews.title: WHA?? PIZZA OVEN???
customer_reviews.text: This is the MOST AMAZING toaster oven!!! We haven't seen this before and we had seen it in Target (who was SOLD OUT!) and just had to have it! This is THE only toaster oven with an area SPECIFICALLY designed for PIZZA! And isn't that the primary reason most people HAVE toaster ovens?? Cooks beautifully, easy to use and I actually threw my toaster away as well because it makes perfect toast.
customer_reviews.author: J.O.

customer_reviews.title: The oven door handle melted and fell off first use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use while we are remodeling and without an oven. Used the pizza oven first, says not to preheat but I would recommend it. Took way longer than expected. Used the oven function first time. The door handle brackets melted at the screw holes and fell off. 350 degrees after 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hagberg

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for its pizza function, but burns pizza. ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for its pizza function, but burns pizza. Didn't bother with trying thick crust pizza only thin crust. The heater elements are too close, pizza drawer probably only for use for toast. Shame. Put it away, switched back to my pressure oven.
customer_reviews.author: Paul V Scott

customer_reviews.title: Best Little Oven
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely recommend this product. I didn't know what to expect with how cheap it was but this is amazing! It cooks pizza perfectly and I love the handle design, it opens and closes to lay flat against the machine and it is very neat. The oven cooks perfectly too and is nice for little things or for people like my sister who thinks a real oven will burn her. All around one of my best purchases, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Dirk Young

customer_reviews.title: Best Feature -- Pizza Drawer
customer_reviews.text: Have not used all of the functions yet but so far I like it. The pizza drawer is awesome! Cooks pizza quick and crust comes out crisp. Only negative is don't put it on the counter anywhere near the smoke alarm. When you open the door to pull out food or check it the heat goes straight to the smoke alarm and off it goes!
customer_reviews.author: mab

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: This works great so far. Saves a lot of time, mess and energy. It also looks good on the counter. Great for cooking salmon, steaks and heating pizza.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Turn the pizza for even baking.
customer_reviews.text: Great pizza oven, and mini convection oven. Just make sure to rotate the pizza mid way through otherwise burnt on one half done on otherside.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: There is no instructions for pre-heatin.when I called the help line the person didn’t know anything about the product, he use a trouble shooting guide.when I ask how do you know when you have the desired temperature he said 10-15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Mark genereux

customer_reviews.title: Great Pizza/Toaster Oven.
customer_reviews.text: What a great toaster oven/ pizza maker. The oven bakes nicely. Toaster setting is spot on. The pizza drawer makes this worth the price. Whether your making homemade pizza or warming it up, this pizza drawer makes perfect pizza every time.
customer_reviews.author: MEM63

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I've only used the pizza function. My vegan pizzas are turning out well, still need to play around with time and temp, but it's great for heating up a slice or two instead of wasting energy to heat up a large oven.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Klekner

customer_reviews.title: Pizza tray works awesome
customer_reviews.text: Think the pizza tray is for like jacks pizzas or Toni’s brands that size. 14 minutes and comes out perfect and no mess. Pull it out the foldable handles and slide it right on the plate. Toaster heats up pretty hot comparable to my old one. The timer can not be trusted for anything less then 5 minutes, better to wait for your toast to be done then walk away. It doesn’t take long for toast and comes out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Joel D

customer_reviews.title: The pizza cooker on the bottom is the only great thing about this
customer_reviews.text: The pizza cooker on the bottom is the only great thing about this. It takes forever to warm food on the top portion. Not worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi62296

customer_reviews.title: Timer use required
customer_reviews.text: I wish it worked without the timer. For the price its really cheap looking. Dials instead of buttons and the timer has to be set for it to bake. Takes a bit longer to cook some things.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Good for frozen pizza
customer_reviews.text: It cooks most normal frozen pizzas very good. I have not used the Turbo setting much to tell if it cooks faster.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the money
customer_reviews.text: Works well so far. Only issue is the bottom of the pizza gets a bit more crispy before the toppings are done, at least for me. But I’m satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Noland

customer_reviews.title: pizza
customer_reviews.text: the pizza cooking part is awesome! makes it crispy and still cooks it thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Aultman

customer_reviews.title: My New Boo!
customer_reviews.text: I added this to my kitchen and it is to cheer for! :) This pizza oven section is fantastic-works like a dream. Toasting even, capacity is generous, controls are old school intuitive....no electronic over complication. CONSUMER RATING: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Knox

customer_reviews.title: Oven works well enough but just know that pizza warmer ...
customer_reviews.text: Oven works well enough but just know that pizza warmer only works if the oven is not in use for anything else. The image is very misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This toaster oven looks beautiful on the counter top and the pizza tray works fantastic for frozen pizza.
customer_reviews.author: lpetra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this oven is great I love it and the kids make lots of pizzas with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Wycoff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was a great price i got it for my daughter but im going bnb to get one for my camper its a perfect size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the handle and now the toasting elements are not working
customer_reviews.text: The handle is crooked. I have had a Oster for years and loved it. This was very similar with the added feature of a pizza tray. The only problem is the handle is crooked which is very weird. Delivered May 1 now July 12th and the toaster element is not working!!!
customer_reviews.author: Flo M.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $
customer_reviews.text: The dedicated pizza drawer is a joke; it either burns the food or it isn’t cooked thoroughly. The oven temperature is inconsistent and you have to constantly check the food to see if it is burning. The toast is either burnt or not toasted. I had another Oster toaster oven that I loved and thought this would be as great. I have tolerated it for almost two years, but it’s time for me to find a new one. Don’t waste your $ on this.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Featherston

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I just love it.. first I was a little scare with the reviews but it’s just a matter of knowing how to timer the food and pizza. Everything came out perfect. ❤️ And the size just perfect also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Only thing I dont like it the timer, hard to see exactly how long you are setting it for but I expected that. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love this appliance.
customer_reviews.text: After a few months, gotta say...I'm loving this appliance. Appreciate that the main heating drawer is spacious, The dials are easy to understand, and the pizza drawer is an added engineered marvel. Someone took time to understand how today's family eats. It has a high-end appearance on the counter. I'm well-pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Royce

customer_reviews.title: Works Great and Love the Pizza Drawer!
customer_reviews.text: This oven works great. We especially love the pizza drawer as its makes frozen pizzas perfect. You don't really need to but we allow it to warm up a bit before putting the pizza in and then follow directions on the box. Comes out just like a normal oven but much more convenient to use. We bought it as we had some problems with our main oven which took several weeks to get the parts and repaired but now use it more than our regular oven.
customer_reviews.author: LDS

customer_reviews.title: Best pizza warmer ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best pizza warmer ever!!! Gets pizza warm and crispy even great for frozen pizzas. Sons love to use it to make sandwiches and pizza rolls. Takes up very little space !!!! Awesome purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Pizza oven
customer_reviews.text: I love it cooks quickly and makes the best pizza ever
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie McKillip

customer_reviews.title: Not a double oven!
customer_reviews.text: It cooks great! The only complaint I have is that you can not use both at the same time! What's the point of having 2 ovens if you cant use them both? If you use the pizza oven it keeps the top part hot enough to keep a pizza warm but wouldn't be hot enough to cook it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Only wish they had a digital timer version ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Only wish they had a digital timer version of this design.. But I knew that before purchase and as designed, it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Brandin Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love the toaster. So easy and convenient the only issue we've noticed is the pizza maker bakes unevenly .. have to turn the pizza few mins in
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: BEST OVEN FOR PIZZA AND TOASTING!
customer_reviews.text: We make toast every morning and this is the best toaster I have ever seen. Put it on TURBO and it makes the outside crispy but leaves the inside softer in HALF THE TIME! You can also use the TOAST setting and get regular toast also. We used the Pizza oven and every pizza at the store fits in this. Even the thick crust ones. You set the temp about 20 degrees lower and cook it 5 min less and you get crispy crust and cooked all the way through! LOVE THIS OVEN! Lots of room!
customer_reviews.author: The ELITE

customer_reviews.title: Oster Toaster Oven
customer_reviews.text: I love this toaster oven! It works great and has great features!
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Bailey

customer_reviews.title: hope
customer_reviews.text: This was a wedding gift for someone and have no idea how it worked out
customer_reviews.author: Esther Medina

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love my mini piza tray. I even make things just so i can cook them. If tour not carful it can cook un even on a pizza so i dropped the temp and it helped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing, convenient, quick, and easy to use! Why didn't I get this sooner?!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Love the oven!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to our counter space. Great crispy crust from this one!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Stearns

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've got to be honest, I really just use the pizza part....which is glorious
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I made. Oven works great and pizza oven is the best thing ever! Worth every penny😊
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Oven features
customer_reviews.text: The knobs to indicate tempature are hard to figure out if you have it on the temp you want. Do not care for the brushed chrome, it is not a smooth brushed chrome and a bit hard to wipe off. Love the pizza features!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Wallis

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH THE MONEY.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the product, I unpacked it yesterday and decided that I was going to try it out. It took almost 20 minutes for it to heat up, which is about the same time it takes to heat of my oven, so there is no use for it. Also appears that it doesn't heat up unless I have the timer going.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: Great for small baking. Air frying takes too long. Great clean look.
customer_reviews.author: Thelma Richard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I don't need my big oven at all anymore. The pizza tray works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Blake

customer_reviews.title: Oster convestion oven
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift ..... The pizza feature is great too
customer_reviews.author: SueThomas

customer_reviews.title: Small, light & practical
customer_reviews.text: The pizza drawer is perfect for toasting and warming without heating up the whole oven
customer_reviews.author: S. Vanderzee

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: It is too small. Not worth it for this price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Love this oven. Great for pizza and leftovers. Nice being able to crisp food. Oven works great and quickly. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Grussing

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This toaster/pizza oven is great! Love the pizza!i use thin tortillas and get nice and crispy!
customer_reviews.author: Marion Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Product didn’t even last 9 months. Amazon refused to give me full refund. Not a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: jan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The handles fell off after two days of use and I could not get a response from the vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Bramham

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 80 yr old mother. She uses all the time, loves making pizza's in it. So easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Kind of expensive for something that came apart with no obvious way to fix it.
customer_reviews.text: This worked nicely for a while, and we loved the pizza feature. A couple of weeks ago the top handle came off. It is held on by two screws, with no way to reattach it.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Mial Scott

customer_reviews.title: Top heat element don't work no more had it for 8 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked good till the top heating element went out only had it 8 months i hope there is a warrant
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Sievers

customer_reviews.title: Get one if you eat alot of frozen pizza's
customer_reviews.text: I have only used the pizza drawer and it works great, I love this thing
customer_reviews.author: BIG George

customer_reviews.title: Toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: Later toaster and pizza oven, third one owned, love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: George Nozick

customer_reviews.title: Cooks all over just set time and it's perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my son who is a bachelor and said he couldn't live without
customer_reviews.author: Waleed

customer_reviews.title: Needed a replacement - great shopping experience.
customer_reviews.text: Love the pizza oven on the bottom. Toast timer could be improved - have to watch it.
customer_reviews.author: R, an Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handle fell off
customer_reviews.text: The oven works well but the handle fell off and I have not been able to find glue that will take the heat to keep it on.
customer_reviews.author: Pandora Adams

customer_reviews.title: Excellent oven
customer_reviews.text: Like this oven it has a lot of features that are useful
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderful and easy to use. Two appliances in one.
customer_reviews.author: Atlas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Works great for frozen and handmade pizza Oven works great too
customer_reviews.author: William J Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Most used kitchen item!
customer_reviews.text: This is a well used oven in our house! Much more efficient and faster than heating up the stove oven. Very simple to understand and operate. We've had this for well over a year now and it is the most used kitchen item. It cooks perfectly and is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Joe P.

customer_reviews.title: Great pizza
customer_reviews.text: I do not have an oven in the place I rent. Have missed cooking pizza's so ordered this. This works great.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas metcalf

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised. Just need to turn the pizza ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Just need to turn the pizza around half way in cooking time. That way it gets brown all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cooks evenly and is perfect for personal size pizzas
customer_reviews.text: cooks evenly and is perfect for personal size pizzas! Only have used a handful of times but am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Can use it for anything
customer_reviews.text: Love this I don’t have to heat up an oven and it gets done quick
customer_reviews.author: Tc

customer_reviews.title: You need to buy some toaster oven pans for convenience.
customer_reviews.text: Made cinnamon rolls, whipped up some corn bread, broiled some pork ribs, made tortilla pizza, even made blueberry muffins. Works great in an RV out at the lake.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great pizza maker and warming oven
customer_reviews.text: Great pizza maker and warming oven. We added it to our Design Dept. kitchen area and they use it everyday!
customer_reviews.author: GT-1Racer

customer_reviews.title: THE PIZZA DRAWER IS A TERRIFIC IDEA... LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Love this oven. I researched a lot of them and it is so convenient with that pizza drawer ... works great and its such a good idea! I put other items in pizza space too besides pizza and it warms up quickly which will be great in the hot summers here! I thought it would be too big but it fits nicely under cabinets. Glad i bought it . I also bought the extra wide Black and Decker one at Bed Bath Beyond and i like that too because you can fit a 13x9 cakepan in it so i think im keeping both of them.
customer_reviews.author: ajk

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Never worked- right out of the box. Doesn’t heat at all, only the pizza drawer heats and takes forever.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Meredith

customer_reviews.title: ... had a huge dent but the second one was fine. Enjoy it very much
customer_reviews.text: The first one sent had a huge dent but the second one was fine. Enjoy it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Above and Beyond Expectations
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice and much better than I expected. Great packing and service.
customer_reviews.author: Barry M. Bashaw

customer_reviews.title: Handle BREAK
customer_reviews.text: Product would rate 5 stars but after two weeks the handle to oven section broke off, and its always a pain to return especially since I tossed the box.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur L. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Total horrible product....timer does not work and pizza oven is way too small.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Not as high quality as it appears.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is all in one. However, a couple of weeks after owning it, the handle fell off in my hand and it's impossible to fix it on your own. I need an entire new door.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. does get hot on all sides but works great and quick. Easy to clean also.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Heir

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Makes pizza really fast and just right ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Makes pizza really fast and just right for crust. I have cooked several Things in it and they all turned out good. Only one thing it is bigger then I thought it was
customer_reviews.author: Mary M.

customer_reviews.title: Hot hot hot
customer_reviews.text: Great oven. Definetly gets hot. Still learning how to not burn toast. But worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible handle
customer_reviews.text: Handle is poorly constructed and fell of stirring the first use!
customer_reviews.author: matthew arseneault

customer_reviews.title: but it worked great. Can't wait to cook a pizza
customer_reviews.text: Very big, but just what we needed. Just received it yesterday and we cooked in it. A little bit of a noise, but it worked great. Can't wait to cook a pizza.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Wendle

customer_reviews.title: The pizza drawer is super small. Barely fits a 12" frozen pizza
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced. The pizza drawer is super small. Barely fits a 12" frozen pizza. It looks good in the photo but the outside is big while the inside is small & only fit 4 pieces of garlic toast. I wouldn't recommend it. There are better products I'm sure.
customer_reviews.author: Alison M. Kirkland

product_meta.title: Oster Convection Oven with Dedicated Pizza Drawer, Stainless Steel (TSSTTVPZDS),Large
product_meta.description: The Oster Convection Oven with Dedicated Pizza Drawer combines countertop convenience with versatile baking and broiling performance. Designed with turbo convection heat technology, this versatile electric oven uses a fan to circulate hot air and help ensure faster, more consistent cooking and browning. Its bottom drawer is ideal for baking pizzas, quesadillas, and other items up to 12 inches in diameter, and the drawer features retractable handles that recess flush into its face. The upper convection oven reaches temperatures up to 450 degrees Fahrenheit and has warm, toast, bake, broil, and turbo settings. Equipped with a 60-minute timer and an auto-shutoff function, this convection oven allows you to precisely time your cooking and notifies you with a bell when time is up. Its two rack positions allow you to fit roasts, casseroles, pies, and more. With its brushed stainless steel exterior, this electric oven attractively complements nearly any kitchen decor.
feature_bullets: Convection oven cooks quickly and browns food evenly
Dedicated pizza drawer is also great for preparing bruschetta and quesadillas
Separate top and bottom crumb trays simplify cleaning; Cool-Touch handles for safe operation
Included baking pan and baking rack double as a broiling pan when assembled together
60-minute timer with auto-shutoff and bell signal
